data.actual_result: The system warns you as if you were properly doing @everyone.
data.expected_result: It should just send the message, as mentions don't work in blockquotes
data.short_description: When you do @everyone but in a blockquote, it still warns you
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any channel - Write `@everyone` into the box (Make sure you have permissions) - Press Enter
